articles.description: The Tamagotchi is being reinvented for its 25th anniversary. The new Tamagotchi Smart puts the creature into a colorful smartwatch, complete with a color touchscreen, a pedometer, and a clock.
articles.content: Featuring a touchscreen and a pedometer

articles.author: Joyce Li
articles.title: Leica Releases First Self-Branded Smartphone, the Leitz Phone 1 - HYPEBEAST
articles.description: Featuring the exact 1-inch camera system unveiled with the Sharp Aquos R6.
articles.content: Japanese carrier Softbank has officially revealed Leica‘s first self-branded smartphone, the Leitz Phone 1. The new phone marks the first time that the camera brand has been directly associated with … [+1645 chars]

articles.author: Sam Byford
articles.title: New Oculus Quest update adds multitasking and wireless streaming for original headset - The Verge
articles.description: Facebook is rolling out its v30 update to the Oculus Quest and Quest 2 VR headsets. v30 includes a new multitasking interface, Air Link wireless streaming for the original Quest, and an accessibility tab in settings.
articles.content:
v30 is rolling out now

articles.title: Controversial Snapchat "Speed Filter" Removed From App - NDTV
articles.description: Snapchat said Thursday it is putting the brakes on a controversial feature that let users of the social network share how fast they were moving.
articles.content:
Parent company Snap had long defended the feature, which was introduced in 2013.
